name: Parasect
effect: (This card cannot be used at official tournaments.)
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: A mushroom grown larger than the host’s body controls PARASECT. It scatters poisonous spores.

attacks.name: Nutritional Support
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic {G} Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Hibernation Spore
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep. During Pokémon Checkup, your opponent flips 2 coins instead of 1. If either of them is tails, that Pokémon is still Asleep.
